data.description:
Pavlov is a team-based multiplayer VR shooter with realistic weapon handling. Play a variety of game modes with over 65 interactable weapons and attachments in various environments.

Team up in a match of 5v5 in Search and Destroy, a classic uncompromising competitive game mode where you must attack or defend against a bomb objective.

Use your detective skills to uncover the traitors in a casual murder mystery gameplay with various player roles in TTT.

Neutralize a monster that escaped captivity in an asymmetrical 1 vs. 9 game.

Operate vehicles such as 4Ã—4s or tanks with intuitive driving controls in a WWII match to defend your homeland in Stalingrad.

Play hundreds of community made mods. 

Bite the bullet, grit your teeth, and queue up.

changelog.change_log: -Fixed issue with being unable to buy discounted cosmetics despite having the correct amount of coins.

Core
-Added new map: Autumn
-Added new cosmetics system 
-Added new golden deagle model (OITC and TTT)
-Adjusted modded items in the buy menu to display more reliably
-Fixed UpdateEquipment not working for mods in some cases
-Fixed a cheesy angle spot in Industry
-Fixed credits button in settings menu not working

TTT
-Adjusted Survivalist and Glitch roles to no longer have a green banner in the scoreboard
-Adjusted Survivalist to now show their role icon when players are dead
-Adjusted TTT Role Selection algorithm for support for role limits with Guaranteed Roles 
-Fixed Soulmate feed typo
-Improvements to TTT delayed round end to include Zombies turning as well
-Fixed people being able to kill each other in the first TTT preround.


Cosmetics Q&A
--------------
Can I gift cosmetics to a friend? 

No. We do not have a gift system, the best way at this moment is to gift them Meta credit to purchase coins themselves.

Can I trade skins?

We do not plan to implement trading.

Are you going to do lootboxes?

No.

Can I earn skins or coins through gameplay? 

Not at this time, however we may explore this method in the future. 

If I regret buying a skin or accidentally bought one, can I get a refund or my coins back? 

No, all sales are final. We have a final confirmation screen to prevent accidental purchases. 

Can I apply a skin to multiple weapons? 

No, all skins are created unique to each gun type. 

Can I apply a charm to multiple weapons? 

Yes, but you will need to purchase multiple charms. 

My account was hacked, and someone purchased a coin pack I never authorized.

You will need to get with Meta support regarding a hacked account. We have no control over your Meta account purchases. Change your password 

Can other players see my skins? 

Yes, but they will not be able to see your charms unless they pick up your gun

How do I buy a skin? 

Purchase Jared coins from the Purchase coins button near the top of the customize menu and select a coin pack amount you want. Once coins are purchased, you will can exchange coins for cosmetics.

Will purchases track between my quest 2 and quest 3?

Yes, your skins are tied to your Meta account. If your account is on both devices the skins will work if you launch the game as your account. 

Will my skins work on PC or PS5 if I buy them on Shack? 

No, we will not have cross buy. 

Are there going to be free skins? 

Yes, right now the noob skin is free! More free content as well as seasonal content to come!

Is there going to be limited purchase availability for some skins? 

We will have limited skins which will have a limited purchase availability for a specific period of time, they may also return to the store again for another limited run in the future. 

 Will new skins come out? 

Yes! We will continue to produce cosmetics over time.

Can I submit my own custom skin to be an official skin?

We are not currently accepting community generated skins to be official at this time, but we may explore the option in the future.

bomb/grenade/flash skins in future?

Not currently on our roadmap but we may consider in the future.

What are the jared coin pack prices and coin ratios?

$5 = 500 Coins, $10 = 1000 coins, 20 = 2000 coins + 200 bonus, $50 = 5000 coins + 500 bonus

-Added PPbizon mag-slap
-Adjusted scoreboard sorting issue for non-team game modes
-Adjusted dead player contrast in scoreboard 
-Fixed position of scoreboard in comp room

Core
-Added bHaptics support
-Added haptic pulsing if your gun is inside a wall
-Adjusted automatic height calibration

Audio
-Fixed switching to ww2 skin changing the radio sounds until you respawn

UI
-Fixed server browser custom gamemodes not showing the gamemode label

Modkit
-Added ability to make content mods dependent on each other
-Added on killed delegate to pawn
-Added IsCompMode function
-Added function to enable/disable team switching (SetTeamSwitchEnabled, IsTeamSwitchEnabled)
-Added function to update an items details (damage values, buy price, etc)
-Fixed issue where you couldn't use grip on a VRHandle
-Fixed issue with playerproxy attaching to avatar, now that the avatar pooled this will no longer work properly
-Fixed custom weapon reloading issue
-Fixed ungrabbing handle when dropping item (Pavlov Kart mod)

TTT
-Added tttgoldengun variant
-Adjusted TTT role selection algorithm
-Adjusted Ballistics Shields to drop on direct newton launcher hit
-Added Stealth Device gadget for Traitors and Mercenary
-Adjusted Hypnotizer to revive players where the body is instead of where the player died
-Adjusted golden gun to not kill victims
-Adjusted TTT radar item code to fix UI issues when shot
-Fixed Monocular UI sorting issue

-Fixed joining community servers while downloading not waiting the proper amount of time, will now display a popup notifying the user (with the option to cancel) and will retry
-Added pages to mod browser
-Added buymenu prefiltering to fix extra pages appearing when there are no selectable items for that page.(mods)
-Prevent knife damage in the first 4.5 seconds of an SND match, this should allow players to get off spawn without having a knife thrown at them from across the map
-Adjusted voice audio
-Fixed some seams showing up in Datacenter
-Fixed Industry wood collision
-Adjusted buymenu to grey out empty categories (modding)
-Optimizations to gore character shader and the bloodsplats shader
-Fixed issue with trip mines not being able to attach to walls in some circumstances
-Fixed map exploit in Pinehill

Modkit
-Fixed push announcer only grabbing custom chants (obj lost)
-Capture The Flag gameplay notify sounds added for defend/taken/capture/return

Admin Menu (Community Servers)
-Added Admin menu button for clear vehicles

Infection:
-Adjusted buymenu gets to be disabled for monsters in preround 

RCON
-added "ClearEmptyVehicles" rcon function
-Added warning notice to uninstall Applab version of the game
